medical_history.chief_complaint: Pancreatic mass and biliary obstruction with abdominal pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began with epigastric pain one day prior to admission. Pain rated as requiring morphine for relief with only two days of relief during hospitalization. Similar pain was reported as early as a previous hospitalization, which self-resolved.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus, Morbid obesity, Coronary Artery Disease status post Myocardial Infarction.
medical_history.family_history: Mother with cervical cancer who passed away, and a history of emphysema in family.
